name: EnergyLens+
tagline: Defining a novel way to personalize your energy consumption in your smart home
body:
EnergyLens+: A complete personal energy consumption monitoring system
==============

Introducing a working prototype of a new personal energy usage/wastage monitoring system for smart homes. It interacts with an eco-feedback app that runs on Android devices.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
